Brand: Kopari

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/EAU, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Juice*, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Glycerin, Betaine, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract *, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit

Extract *, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Fruit Extract, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Dipteryx Odorata (Tonka Bean) Seed Extract, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Sodium

(Tonka Bean) Seed Extract, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Acacia Senegal Gum, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Triethyl Citrate, Xanthan Gum. *Organic
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
